author: Aaron Jones
description:
Star Wars. Stories of good versus evil set in a world designed to sell toys to kids. Swords that light up, guns firing lasers, aliens, princesses and more. Not exactly grimdark, right? A prequel series to a prequel film of the beloved original trilogy, Andor S2 may be the best thing to have ever come […]

The post REVIEW: Andor Season 2 appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Andor Season 2
